name: Mine Against Misery
description:
A rogue inspired game where you escape from monsters by minining new paths to escape
You’re a dwarven miner looking to escape the depths of this procedurally generated dungeon!

  • use the pickaxes scattered around the map to avoid your foes
  • find the randomly placed key that opens the door the the exit room
  • find the exit room

You can find more info about the game on mygamedesign.com or checkout my youtube or any other social media @PracticalNPC
